name: Fantasy News
Description: a simple web app that allows you to look up the latest fantasy football news based on team and post/edit your roster. Future enhancement, user auth. Build using React, MongoDB, Mongoose, Node, Bulma, Express

name: Bud
Description: a simple web app that allows you to create your own budget in a calming simple to use environment. We worked in a team of 3 engineers to create this project. I had the role of Product Manager and Frontend help. We used Ruby on Rails backend and React frontend
